Package MOBLIMA.listing

Class searchListing

java.lang.Object
MOBLIMA.listing.searchListing
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listing
public class searchListing extends Object implements Listing
Helper class to obtain the search term supplied by the moviegoer and display the corresponding movie matches and obtains the moviegoer's selection.
